scripts.start: npm start --prefix server & npm start --prefix ui
scripts.test: npm test --prefix server && npm run test-coverage --prefix ui
scripts.test-e2e: npm start --prefix server & npm run start-test --prefix ui
scripts.deploy: npm run build && firebase deploy && npm run deploy --prefix server
scripts.outdated: (echo CLI: && npm outdated || true) && (echo UI: && npm outdated --prefix ui || true) && (echo SERVER: && npm outdated --prefix server || true)
scripts.install-all: npm run delete-all && npm ci && npm ci --prefix ui && npm ci --prefix server
scripts.update-all: npm run delete-all && rm package-lock.json ui/package-lock.json server/package-lock.json && npm install && npm install --prefix ui && npm install --prefix server && npm run force-https && npm run outdated
